title: Recap: Tech falls in series finale to #7 Oklahoma State - Texas Tech Red Raiders - TexasTech.com
content:
1. Recap: Tech falls in series finale to #7 Oklahoma State - Texas Tech Red Raiders  TexasTech.com
  2. An Explosion of Offense Helps Cowgirl Softball Sweep Texas Tech  Oklahoma State Athletics
  3. OSU crushes Texas Tech, completes sweep in authoritative fashion  Daily O'Collegian
  4. 'It's been coming': A 12-run first inning propels Oklahoma State softball to rout of Texas Tech  Oklahoman.com
  5. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: STILLWATER, Okla. – Texas Tech (17-15, 0-3) dropped the series finale to seventh-ranked Oklahoma State (24-6, 3-0) by a score of 16-2 in five innings Sunday afternoon at Cowgirl Stadium in Stillwater.
